ygData.subject: Re: The pod opens
ygData.msgSnippet: How about we just RP, not discuss books. This is, after all, the Neo Beast Wars RPG, not Books r us or something. Also: Fracturcon, if you d read the rules,

How about we just RP, not discuss books. This is, after all, the Neo Beast 
Wars RPG, not Books'r'us or something. Also: Fracturcon, if you'd read the 
rules, you'll see that group characters are not allowed. That includes 
sentient droids unless they are chars themselves.

::Zardus/DevilDuer/Prowl/Shredder/DeathStorm::

Zardus walks up to Nemesis. "Very well. Let's set off toward the new bots."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer walks into the torture chamber and looks at Wolfgang. "Zardus will 
be back shortly."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl emerges in the controll room. A wall had caved in on his way there and 
he had to take the long way.

He looks around but sees no one. The danger seems to have passed. He runs 
back toward the entrance.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder lifts his face out of the ground and turns to face DeathStorm. The 
damm raven had tackled him when he was about to enter the ship he had found.

He looks at DeathStorm. "Who are you?"
